title: The Best Game of 2017
description: In defiance of reason, good taste and the laws of both god and man, your pals The Besties sat down and recorded a two-hour-and-forty-five-minute battle royale to decide the best game of 2017. Get comfy, get hydrated.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
